name: Splunk IT Service Intelligence
description: This app integrates with Splunk IT Service Intelligence to provide operations on Splunk IT Service Intelligence episodes, services, entites, and object maintenance.

base_url.description: Splunk ITSI search head base URL

port.description: Splunk ITSI search head management port

relative_start_time.description: Relative start time in seconds. to start maintenance window now - 0, to start maintenance window after 5 mins - 300, to start maintenance window after 1 hour - 3600

relative_end_time.description: Relative end time in seconds. to end maintenance window in 1 min from now - 60, to start maintenance window after 5 mins - 300, to start maintenance window after 1 hour - 3600

relative_start_time.description: Relative start time in seconds. to start maintenance window now - 0, to start maintenance window after 5 mins - 300, to start maintenance window after 1 hour - 3600

earliest_time.description: Earliest Time to search. Select from the drop down or enter relative time modifiers - -60m for 60 minutes ago, -24h for 24 hours ago. Ref: https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/8.0.1/Search/Specifytimemodifiersinyoursearch
